mapper.select: SELECT t.table_name, t.table_type, t.comments FROM user_tab_comments t WHERE t.table_name = #{tableName}

SELECT b.column_name, b.data_type, b.data_length, b.data_precision, a.comments FROM user_col_comments a, all_tab_columns b WHERE a.table_name = b.table_name AND a.column_name = b.column_name AND a.table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY b.COLUMN_ID
SELECT cu.column_name FROM user_cons_columns cu, user_constraints au WHERE cu.constraint_name = au.constraint_name AND au.constraint_type = 'P' AND au.table_name = #{tableName}
